content: two and half hours slouchy toque* by jennifer beever *includes futzing around time materials 1 skein of madtosh asap shown in smokestack or your choice of super bulky you ll need about 82 m / 90 yards 8 mm and 10 mm needles for knitting in the round tapestry needle abbreviations k=knit p=purl k2tog=knit two stitches together ssk=slip one stitch knitwise slip one stitch knitwise knit these two stitches together instructions that appear in indicate to repeat that section gauge 11 stitches x 15 row for 10 cm / 4 x 10 cm / 4 50 cm / 20 circumference x 25 5 cm / 10 deep cast on 60 sts with 8 mm needles i like long tail cast on but feel free to use a stretchy method of your choice join to work in the round being careful not to twist for broken rib brim work round 1 k1 p1 to end and round 2 k to end work these two rounds six more times then round 1 once more brim is 8 cm / 3-1/2 deep switch to 10 mm needles and k 15 rounds until toque is about 18 cm / 7 deep begin decreases k1 k2tog k10 ssk four times then k one round k1 k2tog k8 ssk four times then k one round k1 k2tog k6 ssk four times then k one round k1 k2tog k4 ssk four times k1 k2tog k2 ssk four times k1 k2tog ssk four times k2tog six times break yarn leaving a 20 cm / 8 tail draw tail through live stitches to close weave in ends block and enjoy this pattern is intended for personal use only do not reproduce or sell the pattern questions willrun4yarn@gmail com ravelry id willrun4yarn © willrun4yarn 2015
